headline.main: Illinois Governor Offers School Plans After Rapper Meeting
headline.print_headline: Illinois Governor Offers School Plans After Rapper Meeting

lead_paragraph: Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner's administration is circulating a memo with options for funding Chicago Public Schools days after a meeting with Grammy-winning artist Chance the Rapper.
snippet: Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner's administration is circulating a memo with options for funding Chicago Public Schools days after a meeting with Grammy-winning artist Chance the Rapper....
